general_advisory: Dry weather conditions with clear skies are expected. Farmers are advised to monitor pest infestation, apply irrigation as needed, and follow specific crop management practices.

advisory: In transplanted paddy, control grasses, sedges, and broad leaf weeds by spraying recommended pesticides.
To manage Bud Necrosis, spray Neem-based pesticide or chemical pesticides during primary pest infestation.
For Sett Rot management, use recommended pesticides for basal drenching or foliar spray.
To control aphids, spray Neem-based pesticide followed by chemical pesticides.
To manage Fruit rot and Die back disease, spray recommended fungicides at specific crop stages.
To control Alternaria Leaf Spot, spray recommended fungicides based on current weather conditions.
To manage Purple Blotch and Stemphylium leaf blight, spray recommended fungicides at intervals.
To manage mango hoppers, spray recommended pesticides at specific intervals.
For Powdery mildew infestation, spray Carbendazim as a preventive measure.
For countering Foot and Mouth diseases, ensure FMD vaccination once a year.
Vaccinate chicks against Sleeping disease using appropriate vaccines.
